pinyin: Yi1 si1 lan2 Sheng4 zhan4 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: What happened is that a group of Jihadists managed to infiltrate the town over night.
sentences.chinese: 一股圣战组织成员在夜间得以渗入廷巴克图。

sentences.english: Where would dangerous jihadi factions in Libya come from?
sentences.chinese: 这些危险的圣战分子会是从哪里来的呢？

sentences.english: At the same time, the drones are clearly inflicting significant damage on the jihadists.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，无人机明显对圣战分子造成了巨大的损伤。

sentences.english: And every time we did it more, the number of jihadis grew.
sentences.chinese: 我们每多下一番劲，圣战者数量就往上增长。

sentences.english: His ideology of global jihad has also retreated.
sentences.chinese: 他的全球圣战思想也正在退却。

sentences.english: Joshua had yet more help from heaven in this Holy War .
sentences.chinese: 在这场圣战中，约书亚得到极大的神助。

sentences.english: I'll also look in detail at the risks and rewards of crusades and jihads.
sentences.chinese: 我同样会展示十字军东征和圣战的风险和回报的细节。

sentences.english: The Palestinian militant group of Islamic Jihad claimed responsibility of the attack.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒斯坦回教圣战组织承认干下此攻击事件。

sentences.english: Many jihadis fear the Crusader alliance between Jews and Christians.
sentences.chinese: 很多圣战者害怕犹太教和基督教之间的十字军联盟。

sentences.english: The crusades began at the end of the Eleventh Century. They continued for about two-hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 圣战从十一世纪末开始，一直延续了大约两百年。

sentences.english: The both crossed knifes indicate jehad and self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 交叉的刀意味着圣战和自卫。

sentences.english: Two, endangering the state’s existence by making common cause with jihadism.
sentences.chinese: 第二，与圣战主义共谋危及国家的存亡。

sentences.english: But they remind us that no Holy War can ever be a just war.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些提醒我们，圣战绝不会是正义的战争。

sentences.english: I feel as the storm is coming The holy war is near Total chaos.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得风暴即将圣战附近乱了套。

sentences.english: It is one of a number of jihadi groups to have appeared.
sentences.chinese: 该组织是大量涌现的圣战组织中的一个。

sentences.english: "Thanks to Allah the people and the mujahideen are together in this area, " said the Mawlawi Sahib.
sentences.chinese: 感谢安拉，这一地区的人民和圣战者团结为一体。

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
sun worship/Zoroastrianism/see also 祆教[Xian1 jiao4]
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
